text:
motigram.com | REMOTE

Wanted:

Looking for growth hacker, sales associates, customer success members, full stack developers, chatbot developers and machine learning/deep learning experts.

Who we are:

We have built and continue to build a real-time motivational messaging and conversational application that can help motivate people. Imagine helping anyone stop smoking, lose weight, write a book, create a company! You can make a BIG difference in the world on a daily basis!

https://motigram.com

To apply either visit https://motigram.com/careers
